verses.text: Ex anima ay t'a masanil yol yib'anhk’inal tik, scham val eyab'an jun lolonel tik.
Ab'ec ex b'eyum yet' ex meb'a', mach ex ay eyelk'ochi yet' ex comon anima ex.
Ol in lolon t'a jelanil, ol val juntzanh pensar ajaltac snachajeli.
Ol in maclej val vab' slolonel eb' jelan. Ol in b'itej tas ix in k'ayb'ej chi' yet' sonal te' arpa.
¿Tas yuj ol in xivoc ayic ol ja juntzanh sk'ual yaelal t'ayin, ayic ol k'och oyan eb' ajk'ool t'ayin?
Ha eb' ajk'ol chi', a sb'eyumal eb' syak'och yipoc sk'ool, syik'anchaanh sb'a eb' yujto manh jantacoc tas ay t'a eb'.
Palta malaj junok mach syal scolan yetanimail t'a yol yico', ma smananel sq'uinal d'ha Dios.
Max yal-laj co mananel co q'uinal yic wach' ayonnhej eq'ui, yic max onh chami, yujto max techajlaj co tupani.
Ina squila' to junlajan scham anima smasanil. Scham eb' jelan, schampax eb' man jelanoc, haxo sb'eyumal eb', ch'oc mach b'aj scani.
Wach'chom manh jantacoc co lu'um, palta nab'anhej. Ha b'aj tzonh mucchaji, ata' ayonnhejek' t'a masanil tiempo. Junelnhej ol onh cannhej ta'.
Ha onh anima onh tik, manh masaniloc tiempo ayonhek' t'a yol yib'anhk’inal tik. Wach'chom yel te b'eyum onh, palta tzonh chamnhej icha scham nok' nok'.
Icha pax chi' tz'aj satel eb' syipk'olej sb'a, aton eb' syaloch sb'a wach'il.

Ha juntzanh anima chi', a chamel ayoch yilumaloc eb'. Ha tz'ik'anb'at eb' b'aj smucchaj chamnac. Ayic ol sacb'oc, t'a sk'ual yic ol onh ch'olb'itajoc, a eb' anima wach' spensar ol ak'an ganar t'a yichanh eb'. k'ojank'olal ol satem snivanil eb', haxo b'aj smucchaj chamnac ol och scajnub'oc eb'.
Ha in xo jun, ha Dios ol in ik'ancanel t'a yol sk'ab' chamel, ol in yik'anb'at yet'oc.
Ex vetanimail, manh eyak' pensar yuj eb' tz'och b'eyumal, eb' ste q'uechaanh sb'eyumal t'a spat.
Yuj chi' manh e na'a, yujto ayic ol cham eb', malaj jab'oc tas ol yik'b'at eb' yet'oc, manh ol b'atlaj sb'eyumal eb' chi' yet'oc.
Wach'chom te tzalajk'olal yic eb' ayic pitzan eb', ma tz'alji pax wach' lolonel t'a eb' yuj eb' yetanimail yuj sb'eyumal chi',
ol ja sk'ual scham eb', icha ix aj scham eb' smam yicham eb', manhxo ol yil-laj sakil k'inal eb'.
Ha eb' anima b'eyum, tato max nachajel yuj eb' to eq'uelb'anhej yek' masanil tas, lajan ol aj scham eb' icha tz'aj scham nok' nok'.
